subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams had to rally against 23-year-old Heather Watson in the third round to set up a match against Williams’s sister Venus — their first face-off at a Grand Slam event since 2009.
snippet: Serena Williams had to rally against 23-year-old Heather Watson in the third round to set up a match against Williams’s sister Venus — their first face-off at a Grand Slam event since 2009.
